description: This file defines database entity classes for an Android app using Room persistence library, representing data models for level progress, achievements, and rewards for offline-first game data management.

classes.name: LevelProgressEntity
classes.description: Entity representing progress details of a game level, including level number, stars earned, score, completion status, and last played timestamp.

classes.name: AchievementEntity
classes.description: Entity representing an achievement with a unique code, unlock timestamp, and progress counters.

classes.name: RewardEntity
classes.description: Entity representing a reward item with type, amount, and granted timestamp.
